titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4098) to provide for ciminal prosecution of persons who alter or destroy evidence in certain Federal investigations or defraud investors of publicly traded securities, to disallow debts incurred in violation of securities fraud laws from being discharged in bankruptcy, to protect whistleblowers against retaliation by their employers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Phelps. Petition No: 107-10.

bill.summary: 7/10/2002--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4098 (corporate and criminal fraud accountability).
